Ability.Description: Shoots {Amount} magic bullets in all directions from target location, each dealing {MinDamage}-{MaxDamage} damage.
Shoots {Amount} piercing fire bullets in all directions from target location, each dealing {MinDamage}-{MaxDamage} damage and burning enemies for {TotalDamage} over {DurationMS} seconds.
Hurls a quick piercing ball of fire towards the cursor, dealing {MinDamage}-{MaxDamage}. Deals 3 times as much damage to burned enemies.
Burns all enemies within a {Radius} tile radius of the target location for {TotalDamage} damage over {DurationMS} seconds, and damages them for {Damage}
Shoots {Amount} piercing icicles in all directions from target location, each dealing {MinDamage}-{MaxDamage} damage and slowing down enemies for {DurationMS} seconds.
Fires a single piercing shot that deals between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} and paralyzes targets for {DurationMS} seconds.

Creates a blizzard for {Amount} seconds that will deal {Damage} damage and slow down all enemies within a radius of {Radius} at 2 second intervals, and paralyzing all enemies inside for {DurationMS} seconds upon disappearing.
Shoots {Amount} piercing psychic bullets in all directions from target location, each dealing {MinDamage}-{MaxDamage} damage.
Fires a burst of twin lasers, each dealing between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} armor-penetrating damage.
Sends a magical singularity towards cursor location that rapidly deals between {Damage} damage to enemies within a radius of {Radius}.
Fires a bolt of chain lightning, dealing {TotalDamage} to up to {MaxTargets} targets.
Fires a bolt of lightning, dealing {TotalDamage} base damage to each target. Consecutive targets take 20% more damage from the last, up to {MaxTargets} targets.
Fire off an orb that conducts lightning that lasts for {DurationMS} seconds. Hitting Chain Blast with this orb will increase the number of targets hit.
Fires off an orb to cursor location that lasts for {DurationMS} seconds. The orb unleashes a burst of electricity for {Damage} damage within a range of {Radius} tiles when it is hit by Chain Blast.
Fires three blasts of lightning towards the cursor, each dealing {TotalDamage} to up to {MaxTargets} targets.
Conjures a cloud for {DurationMS} seconds. This cloud fires {FireRate} times per second, dealing {Damage} damage to the closest target within {Radius} tiles.

Fires a lightning strike that blows up the cloud closest to the cursor, dealing {Damage} damage and slowing all enemies within a range of {Radius} tiles. If there is no cloud near the cursor enemies are only slowed.
Fires a bolt of lightning to the enemy closest to the cursor, that splits into multiple bolts that hit all enemies within a {Radius} tile range.
Fires a single blast of lightining that deals {TotalDamage} damage and paralyzes all targets for up to {DurationMS} seconds, at up to {MaxTargets} targets.

Fires off an orb to cursor location that lasts for {DurationMS} seconds. The orb is charged every time it is hit with lightning attacks from the player. Releases bursts of damage to all nearby enemies when lifetime is depleted or charge capacity is reached.
Heals all players within a range of {Radius} for {Amount} HP.
Heals players and damages enemies within a range of {Radius} for {Amount} HP.
Lasting for {ActiveDuration} seconds, this shield will activate under 50% HP, blasting an AOE of {Damage} across {Radius} tiles.
Damages and burns all enemies within {Radius} tiles. Deals {Damage} direct damage and {TotalDamage} fire damage over {DurationMS} seconds.
Heals players within {Radius} tiles, the amount depends of the distance between the center and the target. Heals +100% in the center of the circle, with a base amount of {Amount}.
For {ActiveDuration} seconds, if the player's health falls below 33%, heals the player for {Amount} health and grants an armored effect for {DurationMS} seconds.
For {ActiveDuration} seconds, all damage is negated and 10% of all damage is added to the player's health.
Heals the user and nearby players. Amount is based of the user's health, with a base amount of {Amount}.
For {ActiveDuration} seconds. 50% of all damage is negated and sent back to enemies.
For {ActiveDuration} seconds, all damage dealt is increased based on how high your health is, and all damage taken is decreased based on how low your health is.
Enters you into a different world that enemies can't see for {DurationMS} seconds.
Fires 3 short range projectiles towards the cursor, each dealing between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} damage, and stunning the enemy for 3 seconds.

Shoots 5 short range projectiles in a wide arch, dealing between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} damage each. Also applies an armored effect for {DurationMS} seconds to all players within a radius of {Radius}.
All enemies within a radius of {Radius} will lower their armor and become enraged at the player for {DurationMS} seconds, making them attack the player regardless if other players are nearby.
Spawns 3 Stone Guard familiars in front of the player with {Amount} HP each. They will attract enemies and take hits for the player.
Shoots a single very high damage short range projectile that will deal between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} to any one target.
An AOE with a radius of {Radius} slightly in front of the player that deals {Damage} damage and applies bleeding for {DurationMS} seconds to all enemies inside.
An AOE on the player with a radius of {Radius} that deals damage to the closest enemy based on how low their health is, with a base damage of {Damage}.
Fires 3 medium range projectiles that will each deal between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} damage, and will paralyze the foe for 3 seconds.
Gives the user an armored effect while active.
For the very short duration of {DurationMS} seconds, the user is completely immune to all damage taken.
Tosses a vial of poison that explodes to deal {TotalDamage} over {DurationMS} seconds to all enemies within a radius of {Radius}.
An instant blast of poison on the cursor that deals {TotalDamage} over {DurationMS} seconds to all enemies within a radius of {Radius}.
Blinds all enemies for {DurationMS} seconds within a radius of {Radius} from the cursor.
Applies a death mark to all enemies within a radius of {Radius} from the cursor for {DurationMS} seconds. Death Marked enemies take 10% damage for all damage you inflict to other enemies.
Tosses a much stronger more concentrated poison that deals {TotalDamage} over {DurationMS} seconds to all enemies within a radius of {Radius}.

Fires a short range poison dagger that deals between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} direct damage, {TotalDamage} poison damage and chance to apply a slow, blind or paralyze effect for {DurationMS} seconds.
An aoe that deals {Damage} damage to the closest enemy within a radius of {Radius}. Deals double damage if the enemy hp is less than 10%. Applies a bleeding effect of {DurationMS} seconds.
Tosses a poison that tosses out three more poisons in random directions. Poisons deal {TotalDamage} damage over {DurationMS} seconds to all enemies within a radius of {Radius}.
tosses an acid bomb that will blow up in a large poison AOE when an enemy comes near. Deals {TotalDamage} damage over {DurationMS} seconds to all enemies within a radius of {Radius}.

Fires 11 toxic bolts in the direction of the cursor, which will explode in a small poisonous AOE when hitting enemies. Each bolt does between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} direct damage and {TotalDamage} poison damage over {DurationMS} seconds within a radius of {Radius}
Fires a single piercing arrow that deals between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} damage and slows down all enemies it hits.
Fires 5 piercing arrows in a spread that deal between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} damage and slow down enemies they hit.
Fires 5 non-piercing arrows in a spread that will deal between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} to enemies and will burn them for {TotalDamage} over {DurationMS} seconds.

Fires 5 arrows that will deal between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} damage and will explode and damage all enemies within a radius of {Radius}. If the target is burning the explosion will also apply a burn effect of {TotalDamage} damage over {DurationMS} seconds.
Fires a single high speed arrow that will deal between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} damage.
Fires a single high range arrow that will deal more damage based on how far the arrow travels, with a base damage between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage}.
Fires a single arrow that heavily increases in damage for each target it hits, with a base damage between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage}
Fires a single piercing arrow that will deal between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} damage and paralyze targets it hits.
For {ActiveDuration} seconds, fires batches of 3 shots at rapid intervals at the nearest enemy, each dealing between {MinDamage} and {MaxDamage} damage.
For {ActiveDuration} seconds, every shot that hits an enemy will give you a 5% increase in damage to both ability and weapon damage.
Places your vision in an area. Cast again to stop.
makes you glow like a fairie
Fires off an orb to cursor location that lasts for {DurationMS} seconds. The orb unleashes a burst of electricity for {Damage} damage within a range of {Radius} tiles when it is hit by Chain Blast.
